title: 10 Perch of Land for Sale in Kadawatha.
details:
For immediate Sale Prime Residential 10 Perches of flat Solid at Gonahena Road, Bangalawatte Junction, Kadawatha. Less than 1 Km to Kandy Road (Armstrong Junction) and just over 1 Km to Southern Highway entrance.

Ideal residential area in view of its prime location and the ever increasing value of land in the area, with all essential and commercial buildings, schools sales outlets etc situated in close proximity.


- 15 feet wide good motarable road up-to the land

- Perfect title for financing.

Land value ever increasing in this area with Highway projects.
